# plot_horizontal_barplot

```{r fig.height=3}
plot_data <- gapminder %>% 
  filter(year == 2007) %>%
  group_by(continent) %>%
  summarize(population = floor(1e-06 * sum(pop)), .groups = "drop")

plot_horizontal_bars(plot_data, 
                        xvar = "continent",
                        yvar = "population",
                        palette_function = "brewer.blues",
                        colors = NULL,
                        base_size = 14,
                        label_size = 4,
                        label_k = FALSE, 
                        bar_width = 0.6,
                        title = "Populatie (miljoenen)") + 
  theme(aspect.ratio = 0.25)  # meer ggplot
```



```{r}
plot_data <- gapminder %>% 
  filter(year == 2007) %>%
  group_by(continent) %>%
  summarize(population = floor(1e-06 * sum(pop)), .groups = "drop") %>%
  mutate(continent = reorder(continent,population,mean, 
                             decreasing = TRUE))  # of FALSE 

plot_horizontal_bars(plot_data, 
                        xvar = "continent",
                        yvar = "population",
                        palette_function = NULL,
                        colors = rainbow(5),
                        base_size = 14,
                        label_size = 4,
                        label_k = FALSE,   # labels voor duizend tallen
                        label_perc = TRUE,
                        title = "Populatie (miljoenen)")
```



# plot_value_by_time



```{r}
plot_data <- gapminder %>% 
  filter(country == "Netherlands") %>%
  mutate(pop = 1e-06* pop)

plot_value_by_time(plot_data,
                   xvar = "year",
                   yvar = "pop",
                   plot_type = "bars",
                   palette_function = NULL,
                   colors = "red",
                   base_size = 14,
                   label_size = 4,
                   point_size = 3,
                   line_width = 1.2,
                   label_bars = FALSE,
                   ylab = "Populatie",
                   xlab = "Jaar",
                   title = "Nederland")

```

```{r}
plot_data <- gapminder %>% 
  filter(country == "Netherlands") %>%
  mutate(pop = 1e-06* pop)

plot_value_by_time(plot_data,
                   xvar = "year",
                   yvar = "pop",
                   plot_type = "lines",
                   palette_function = NULL,
                   colors = "red",
                   base_size = 14,
                   label_size = 4,
                   point_size = 3,
                   line_width = 1.2,
                   label_bars = FALSE,
                   ylab = "Populatie",
                   xlab = "Jaar",
                   title = "Nederland")

```


```{r}
plot_data <- gapminder %>% 
  filter(country %in% c("Netherlands","Belgium","Luxembourg","Denmark")) %>%
  mutate(pop = 1e-06* pop)

plot_grouped_value_by_time(plot_data,
                   xvar = "year",
                   yvar = "pop",
                   group = "country",
                   plot_type = "lines",
                   palette_function = "viridis",
                   colors = NULL,
                   base_size = 14,
                   label_size = 4,
                   point_size = 3,
                   line_width = 1.2,
                   label_bars = FALSE,
                   ylab = "Populatie",
                   xlab = "Jaar",
                   title = "West-Europa") +
  ylim(c(0,20))
```

```{r}
plot_data <- gapminder %>% 
  filter(country %in% c("Netherlands","Belgium","Denmark")) %>%
  mutate(pop = 1e-06* pop,
         country = factor(country, levels = c("Denmark","Belgium","Netherlands")))

plot_grouped_value_by_time(plot_data,
                   xvar = "year",
                   yvar = "pop",
                   group = "country",
                   plot_type = "stacked_bars",
                   palette_function = "viridis",
                   colors = NULL,
                   base_size = 14,
                   label_size = 4,
                   point_size = 3,
                   line_width = 1.2,
                   label_bars = FALSE,  # TRUE werkt nog niet (?)
                   ylab = "Populatie",
                   xlab = "Jaar",
                   grouplab = "Land",
                   title = "West-Europa")
```
